display.$value: Mixin for screen readers only, but remains focusable
display.name: cdr-display-sr-only-focusable

container.$value: Mixin for wrapping page content responsively
container.name: cdr-container-fluid

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at extra small breakpoint only
media-query.name: cdr-xs-mq-only

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at extra small breakpoint and above
media-query.name: cdr-xs-mq-up

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at small breakpoint only
media-query.name: cdr-sm-mq-only

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at small breakpoint and above
media-query.name: cdr-sm-mq-up

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered below small breakpoint
media-query.name: cdr-sm-mq-down

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at medium breakpoint only
media-query.name: cdr-md-mq-only

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at medium breakpoint and above
media-query.name: cdr-md-mq-up

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered below medium breakpoint
media-query.name: cdr-md-mq-down

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at large breakpoint only
media-query.name: cdr-lg-mq-only

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered at large breakpoint and above
media-query.name: cdr-lg-mq-up

media-query.$value: Mixin content rendered below large breakpoint
media-query.name: cdr-lg-mq-down

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at extra small breakpoint only with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-xs-cq-only

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at extra small breakpoint and above with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-xs-cq-up

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at small breakpoint only with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-sm-cq-only

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at small breakpoint and above with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-sm-cq-up

container-query.$value: Container content rendered below small breakpoint with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-sm-cq-down

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at medium breakpoint only with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-md-cq-only

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at medium breakpoint and above with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-md-cq-up

container-query.$value: Container content rendered below medium breakpoint with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-md-cq-down

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at large breakpoint only with optional name
container-query.name: cdr-lg-cq-only

container-query.$value: Container content rendered at large breakpoint and above with optional name
